title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.16 - Full board review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 300.16 - Full board review

State Regulations

Whenever, on the board's own motion, a case is accepted for
review by the full board, notice thereof shall be mailed to the claimant, his
representative, if any, the employer, the carrier and the special fund, if it
is a party in interest. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
300.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
